mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Robert Lewis to Martha Washington, 1800 May 1
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lewis, Robert, 1769-1829
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lewis writes his aunt that a backward spring and plowing prevent him coming to bring rental money -- Mr. Daingerfield, "a young Gentleman that lives with me" will deliver money -- please give him receipt. Autograph letter signed, 1 page, endorsed by Lewis, "Copy letter to Mrs. Martha Washington May 1 1800", laminated watermark (1797).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
